alert.note: Alert for Branch; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 7:01PM EDT until July 26 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN STEUBEN...SOUTHEASTERN ST. JOSEPH AND SOUTHERN BRANCH COUNTIES... At 701 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bronson, or near Sturgis, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Bronson around 705 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include East Gilead, Nevada Mills, Burr Oak, California, Fawn River, Kinderhook, Batavia, Findley, Matteson Lake, and Marble Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 355 and 357. Interstate 69 in Michigan between mile markers 1 and 13. Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 133 and 149. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
